34178557.review:
Okay, so this is something really special for me.

Crashday has always been one of the games from my childhood that have constantly had a place on my harddrive throughout all the years and I played it at leats once a year, even if it was only to install some mods. I had tons of fantastic hours of gameplay in this game and when I found out that it's going to be remastered, I nearly choked. I never expected this but I love the fact that it happened!

About the game itself: Crashday is a game in which you race cars, fight with cars and do stunts with cars. Those are equipped with a minigun and a rocket launcher (not usable in every mode/event). The vanilla game features 12 cars, all of which have their own special capabilities, and a whole bunch of tracks/scenarios which are playable in seven game modes. 

There's [b][i]Wrecking Matches[/i][/b], which is basically the Vehicle deathmatch in which you fight other drivers and earn points for kills/wrecks. This can be played in an FFA variant of in teams.

Then there's [b][i]Death Matches[/i][/b], which is pretty much the same except for the fact that each player or team has to be first to reach a specific amount of kills.

[b][i]Last Man Standing[/i][/b] should be quite self-explanatory, you fight other drivers to complete destruction, and the last car to stand wins.

There's also  [b][i]Stunt Shows[/i][/b] in which the player has to show tricks with his vehicle, e.g. jumps, barrel rolls, flips and general destruction. The aim of this mode is to collect as many point through combos in a given time.

[b][i]Races[/i][/b] should not need to be explained, they work the same as in every other racing game (except for the gunplay, maybe).

[b][i]Hold the Flag[/i][/b] is a classic mods in which a player or a team has to capture a flag and keep it while driving through a set amount of checkpoints. The first team to clear enough checkpoints wins and the flag can be taken away from another car by ramming it.

[b][i]Pass the Bomb[/i][/b] is a mode played in Death Match arenas where one player gets a bomb fixed to his car at the start of each round which has a timer that runs out before it explodes. The bomb gets passed on to other cars by ramming them. Whoever had the bomb last gets the most points each round, and the one who blows up gets nothing.

[b][i]Bomb Runs[/i][/b] are a kind of races in which every participant gets a bomb fixed to his car which will only go off if the car's speed decreases below a certain point. The minimum required speed raises with each passed checkpoint of the race.

At last, there's [b][i]Test Drives[/i][/b], which simply let you roam around the maps on your own without any goal.

Another unique feature about this game is its detailed track editor, which lets the player choose from a huge variety of environmental tiles and objects (expandable through the Steam workshop) and build a track, arena or scenario of their own. It's easy to use and gives a lot of room for creativity.

The career mode is quite short, which I find to be a little sad as the game has potential to hold a much bigger number events, but what's there is good, and should be challenging enough for most players.

The multiplayer mode offers everything that the single player mode offers aswell, except for the Test Drive mode, but as far as I've been experiencing it, it's great fun, aswell with friends as in public lobbies.

In my opinion, Crashday is an underrated game with a lot of potential for modding and building and every fan of Racing games should give it a try, especially if they love a good bit of destruction with it.

Из плюсов:
+ Обновлённый графон. Может, он и не сильно отличается от старого, но выглядит приятно и глаз не режет
+ Саундтрек остался таким же взрывным

+ Открытость к самым разным модификациям

Из минусов:
- Немного непонятное и "деревянное" управление на некоторых машинах (хотя к нему быстро привыкаешь)
- Очень, ну очень короткая карьера. Можно зависнуть из-за сложности, но самих событий очень мало

Комментарий:
Не знаю, стоит ли она своих денег, но я купил её потому, что играл ещё 8 лет назад. Ностальгия, все дела. Сама по себе игра достойная внимания. Мультиплеер приносит бурю эмоций. Правда, с ним есть проблемы, если хост находится далеко. Тогда начинают лагать хитбоксы, появляется неприятная задержка и всё в таком духе. Да, случается, но от этого ни одна игра не застрахована. Короче, ремастером это можно назвать с натяжкой, но с игры определённо сдули пыль и вдохнули вторую жизнь. Если мультиплеер не умрёт через пару месяцев, это будет шикарно. Рекомендую ли я? 34173482.review:
Another place, another time, another Crashday!!!

Eines meiner absoluten Lieblingsspiele meiner 2006er Kindheit und schon beim Titelbildschirm bekommt man bei der Musik förmlich Gänsehaut und richtg Bock auf das Spiel.

Die Steuerung und das Gameplay sind schnell erklärt. Ich empfehle hier ganz klar einen Controller!!
In den ersten Tutorial Rennen werden die verschiedenen Renn-Modi gezeigt und auch der Auto-Shop erweist sich als sehr simpel und leicht verständlich.
Von Sprint, Rundkurs, Stunt, Wrecking( Andere Fahrzeuge mit Raketenwerfer und Minigun zerlegen), Zeitrennen und Capture Flag ist hier alles dabei.
Mit jedem Rennen verdient man sich Geld und Respekt. Geld kann man fürs Autotuning bzw Aufrüstung einsetzen, Respekt braucht man hingegen um sich bessere Fahrzeuge kaufen zu können, die im Verlauf des Karrieremodus freigeschaltet werden.
Eine richtige Story gibt es hier nicht wirklich, eher so ne Art Einführung in die Crash-Szene, aber das tut dem Spiel überhaupt keinen Einbruch.
Der Soundtrack ist einfach passend zum Spiel und eher Richtung "Rock" und "Electro" angelegt. Man bekommt hier definitiv Lust auf mehr!!
Einen Online-Multiplayer und gewisse Minigames ( Autobombe, Weitsprung, Checkpointjagd) sowie einen Streckeneditor sind hier auch übrigens dabei. Also wer Lust hat seine eigenen Stunt-Strecken und Wrecking-Strecken zu erstellen und im Netz zu präsentieren, der hat hier freie Hand.
Auch Mods lassen sich ins Spiel integrieren.
Auch hat man die Möglichkeit seine Rennen aufzuzeichnen und im Replay später wieder anzuschauen!!
Also wer auch immer auf Autos, Explosionen, geilen Soundtrack, Smileys, Rennen und noch mehr Explosionen steht bzw einfach mal Bock hat andere Kontrahenten gehörig eins mit ner Rakete in den Hintern zu jagen, der ist hier bei Crashday genau richtig!! Zusammen mit Freunden macht es nochmals doppelt soviel Spaß!!

Lange Rede, kurzer Sinn.. LETS CRASH!!!

34162630.review:
Well, it's Crashday... if you don't know it yet, watch the videos above. It's a Derby destruction game with softbodies, missiles and mini guns, tuning and a chessboard oriented map editor. The modding community is alreayflooding the workshop with content and... oh yeah, it's from 2006.

In case you actually know this game from back then, here is what they changed: 
-Redone Multiplayer based on steam
-"pickups" like ammo, boost and repair
-Controller support (even in menus) and adjustment
-Graphics (don't expect too much), but it's all in he right places
-The career difficulty is kicking butts now and it's localized in English
-The gui was updated
-Launcher with Modloader

Overall that's it. That and the Steam Workshop implementation. 

I wish they would have given us a look around option, the right stick has no use and they could have given us a few more options in the editor, simply reducing hardware based limitations.

They ask you to pay 12 bucks for it and for me and my nostalgia glasses there's no debate, but for anyone, I think it's a fair and reasonable price. Sure it's old, but this game lives! And do you know why? Because their fanbase rocked on for a decade and their original Creators put all their dedication and love into this and they still do after almost 20 years since they started programming it!
So... Hell yeah, it's worth it! Join in on the action and blow S,H1T up!

34156961.review:
I used to play the original Crashday back in ~2006-2007. I honestly don't remember alot about it, other than that I liked it at the time. As a remaster, I can't tell any difference from how I remember the original to be: 

- The graphics are on par with a polished game from 2006, apparently they redid some aspects of the original but I can't see it
- The soundtrack is good if you enjoy rock and quirky electronic music
- The controls are surprisingly way more stiff than I remember, turning your car is kind of difficult. It's not that they feel weighty, it just feels like you aren't turning the wheel as far as you can
- I played the campaign for a solid 10 minutes and it says i'm 11% through it, so expect less than a 1 1/2 hour story mode
- The game modes are still fun, the minigames etc. are cool but aren't very substantial
- This game uses arrow keys for control by default but you CAN rebind them

The saving grace of this game is probably the online, which is the main reason I'd see anyone buying it. For $10, even with all of the faults I mentioned it's still a very solid choice for an online racer/vehicle combat game. If you've never played Crashday before, please recognize that the target demographic for this game is people who have nostalgia for the original and probably are viewing it from a much more rose-tinted perspective. If you have an extra $10 Rocket League is an infinitely better vehicle combat game with much tighter controls and a much larger userbase.

It's worth mentioning that this game also has a built in level editor and steam workshop support for those and mods; It's way too early to determine what the modding scene will be like for this game, but thats always something to take into consideration. I'd still say that if you have $10 and you want a fun racing game this is worth trying out, but don't expect amazing if you don't have any nostalgic feelings about it.

[Edit]
I just played the online, this game is balanced awfully. Since turning is so stiff you pretty much have to drift around every corner, but drifting is way too floaty and the maps are not big enough to accomodate for 3+ people drifting around a corner. For the capture the flag mode, the hitbox for taking the balloon is too big on the sides of the car so that you can grab it without even touching, but too small on the front and back so that you can hit the car but still not get it. Multiplayer seems to oddly favor the host of the match, as they always spawned closest to the balloon and seemed to move faster than the other players. Destroying peoples cars is way too underpowered with weapons and way too overpowered with ramming. The one match where I won, I made it through the final checkpoint and the game told me "Congratulations! You placed second" which is currently messing with me on a level beyond my conscious mind. So the main game is short, the multiplayer isn't balanced, and the controls are whack. I can't really recommend it.

Mais on a quoi pour le prix ? 

-Un jeu Bourrin et Fun, une miriade de modes de jeu et de paramètres que l'host peut configurer a sa guise (référez-vous a la page magasin qui vous contera les modes de jeux) . 

- Un mode carrière Solo 

- Une conduite arcade mais pas dénué d'intérêt , se planter contre un mur a des conséquences et il n'est pas vraiment possible de garder l'accélérateur appuyé en pensant que tout va bien se passer .

-des voitures au comportement different , une corvette ce n'est pas fait pour du Hors piste :) 

- la mitralleuse et le lance rocket ( non téléguidé , je précise quand même ) .

- des véhicules qui subissent des dégats , autant visuellement que dans le gameplay . 

- de la musique assez rock and roll ( penser a baisser quand même dans les options, de base sa crache pas mal dans les oreilles) . 

- 12 véhicules avec un peu de personnalisation .

ET SURTOUT : Un Workshop ou la communauté pourra créer des circuits :) 


Pour le prix, je trouve le jeu Vraiment Super marrant , vif et Fun , Une sorte de mix a mes yeux avec Flatout et Interstate premier du nom (pour les plus vieux) , a la fois rageant et jouissif , avec pas mal de modes de jeu intéressant .

La question primordial reste , est ce que la communauté est grande ? non , 278 joueurs le 1er jour de sa sortie, ce n'est certes pas extraordinaire, mais je pense sincérement que le jeu a assez d'intèrêt pour garder une communauté active , surtout qu'il surf aussi sur la nostalgie des pocesseurs du 1er épisode .

Avec un prix assez attractif , et un gameplay aussi fun et n'oublions pas le Workshop , je pense sincérement ( moi qui suis habituellement assez péssimiste sur le sujet) que ce jeu peut durer . une chose est d'ore et déja certaine, vous en aurez pour votre argent , et si des potes vous rejoigne dans l'aventure , il est clair que ça reste le jeu qui se lancera souvent :)

Я играл в эту игру с момента выхода. Застал настоящие кланы (а не те, что были последние лет семь), застал большое первое падение серверов, и второе тоже. Играл с тем, кто держал сервер до выхода игры в стим, играл с самими разработчиками. Играл стабильно все эти 11 лет. Эту игру я всегда ставил первой на свою чистую винду, или новый компьютер. 34150952.review:
I've been a longtime fan of the game since its original launch in 2006. When I heard that Crashday was getting a re-launch with improvements, enhancements, and Steam Workshop support, I knew I had to get this game.

Crashday: Redline Edition provides EVERYTHING that fans of the original have come to expect. There have been no un-necessary changes, meaning that longtime fans will be able to pick this up and start playing online or in the game's single player right away. The improved gamepad support is greatly appreciated, and whilst it does take a bit of time to memorize the buttons, a bit of playing will definitely help this out. 

The gameplay is addicting and rewarding. Being able to demolish your opponents or friends online and at times even escape with the victory is always a great feeling. Thanks to the addition of powerups, it can keep matches going for longer and adding more depth to the matches. The car handling is exactly as it was 11 years ago, so its easy for me to get back into the hang of things, but newcomers might need to take a bit of time to master it down. Once you've got it down however, its solid and responsive.

The graphics are largely the same from the original release, however there are some enhancements made to keep the game from looking as if its aged poorly. For a small game like this, it still looks rather good considering its original time of release.

The online at the time of this review isn't exactly the smoothest. Sometimes races may fail to start, but when they do it seems to be pretty consistent. Lag is dependant on the person's connection, but if you are racing with others who have good connection, you shouldn't have many issues.

The music is the same as original. Which is nice.

Thanks to Steam Workshop support and the built-in track editor, this game provides plenty in terms of replay value, allowing you to mod and create to your heart's desire. Kudos points to Moonbyte for providing a Mod Manager at startup, so you can set it to your liking. Reminds me of the old fan-made mod managers from Need for Speed: High Stakes. OH, and you can use mods online! Take-Two should take some lessons there.. 

If you've never had the chance to play this game before, DEFINITELY consider getting this Steam release. Its 100% faithful to the original and has several bug fixes, optimizations, enhancements, and many more to make this the definitive release of the game. For longtime fans like myself, I am going to enjoy the many hours I spend in this game.

I highly recommend this game.

Для меня если честно было шоком, когда я узнал, что выпустят переиздания, т.к наконец-то я смогу узнать весь игровой процесс данной игры, который мне не был доступен. Кратко говоря про само издание, игру сделали на том же движке (Т.к бюджет был сильно ограничен и в интервью с разработчиками было сказано,что игру недопилили) и поэтому графика мягко сказать не 2017 года, даже не 2012, но графика у неё не вырви глаз, а физика машин очень даже хороша. Рекомендую всем, кто играл в неё ранее и кто хочет познакомиться с данным шедевром! 10 переизданий из 10!
P.S: В игре ещё добавили пару новых фишок и довели до ума старые вещи.
P.S 2: Игра ещё не много сыра, баги присутствуют, но я считаю, что старт можно назвать очень успешным.

34150304.review:
[h1]Today is Crashday![/h1]

Crashday wurde im Februar 2006 in Deutschland für den PC released und startete damit eine neue Ära des Rennspiel-Genres.
Nun bekommt der Titel eine Remastered Version für den Computer und wird nach 11 Jahren wiederveröffentlicht.

Crashday prägte meine Kindheit mit den tollem Gameplay, großartigen Tracks, einzigartigen Rennstrecken und viel Action.

Zwar bin ich eher kein Fan von Rennspielen, habe aber damals Interesse an diesem Spiel gefunden was mich dazu bringt einer der ersten Käufer von Crashday: Redline Edition zu sein.

Ich bin froh endlich mal wieder ein paar Autos zu schrotten, Stunts zu machen und mir die Musik in meinem Gehirn einzuspeisen.

Jeder dem dieses Spiel gefällt, kann ich herzlich eine Empfehlung ausschreiben.

Großes Lob an die Entwickler, eine Legende wiederzubeleben!

39579338.review:
Crashday - это игра в свое время полюбившееся многим любителям взрывать, давить и закатывать в асфальт своих оппонентов. Эта легендарная, с большой буквы - Игра вышла в 2006 году и стала очень популярна у игроков. Она давала геймерам мощный и быстрый автомобиль, ну а разъяренным автолюбителям оставалось лишь решить все споры на дороге с помощью применения ракет, бортовых пулеметов и конечно же тарана.

Crashday Redline Edition – переиздание оригинальной игры 2006 года, которое разработчики решили выпустить на не угасающей волне со всеми и заработать денег. В этом "ремастере" прикрутили достаточно приятную графику, подправили модельки автомобилей, добавили с десяток новых трасс и сетевой режим. Режим карьеры остался прежним и проходиться так же быстро, правда финальную битву усложнили и сделали достаточно интересной. На этом все.

К покупке рекомендую исключительно на распродаже тем, кто с игрой не знаком (олдфаги уже давно купили в коллекцию ^.^). Игра такая же хорошая как и раньше, плохо что онлайн в ней нулевой. По этому если думаете играть по сети - забудьте, разве что найдете себе товарища по разносу в пух и прах оппонентов (ботов) .
